services.name: AC Repair Service
services.description: Professional AC repair and maintenance service. Our expert technicians provide comprehensive AC repair solutions including refrigerant recharge, compressor repair, filter replacement, and general maintenance.

services.description: Expert split AC repair services. We handle all types of split air conditioner repairs including gas refilling, compressor issues, and electrical problems.

services.description: Professional AC installation service for all types of air conditioners. Our technicians ensure proper installation with warranty coverage.

services.name: AC Maintenance Package
services.description: Comprehensive AC maintenance package including cleaning, servicing, and preventive maintenance to keep your AC running efficiently.
